text: Last month, Meghan Markle bid'adieu'to her acting career, role as paralegal Rachel Zane and adorable on - screen family of co - stars in the final episode of Suits Season 7. So can you blame us for wondering which of the bride's cast mates would be invited to her big day? Well, we can now reveal that the show's most lauded and best loved stars have turned up at St George's Chapel, Windsor Castle to celebrate their former colleague's wedding today, and we for one are overjoyed. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Rex Arriving en mass at the Windsor location, the Suits cast truly brought a dash of Hollywood to the proceedings with some of the most fabulous outfits of all the wedding guests.
